default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Oh fu... ahem, who are you looking for? Syndicate gang? Sinner? I wouldn't dare touch these businesses! How could a refined girl like me be involved with the Iron Gang, haha.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: I really gotta practice harder, or those kids are gonna have a real laugh.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Now, I am powerful enough to take lead of the family, standing proud, in front of my peers.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Stay back. Don't poke your head out.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: That'll show ya!!! Um, I mean... how impressive!

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: That was nothing scary! Got some loot for ya!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Weren't ya causing a scene back then? Well then why don't you continue!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Think you're tough? I dare you to come to the back door, you and me!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Messing with MY people? Die!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: At least... this time... I didn't run away...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: You're back? Did you get the fluffy thing you promised me? Just had a big figh... big party with them, the decorations on my umbrella were all torn off.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: You've been to so many places, tell me, what are the girls in Eastside wearing lately?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Hmm... the wound is covered with a cute band-aid, and the collar torn during the fight is pinned with a pretty brooch, now I should look fine... Oh fu—Ah! Hello, Chief! Since when were you here?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Now that I think about it, my life wasn't too far from ordinary. It's just eating, chatting, fighting with rival gangs, working out, sleeping...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: You should know by now that I'm the heir to the Iron Gang, but don't worry, I won't go anywhere. After all, if I go back all of a sudden, I might bring them even bigger trouble...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: When you go on a mission to Syndicate, if you see those brats doing something bad, you can use my name to teach them a lesson! But don't use real weapons, after all, they're my boys...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Being found out to be a Sinner in Syndicate is really troublesome, I have to do a dozen more fights every day. I can endure people looking for trouble, but my boys did nothing wrong to bear this with me... So I told myself: run, run to a place where no one knows you.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I used to be a coward who only hid under the umbrella and relied on others to protect me... But now, you gave me the courage to face everything on my own, and to find a way to protect the family with my own strength. From now on, I will carry this umbrella, stand firm, and protect everyone I care about.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Hair, good, accessories, good, cute umbrella, good, mindset, good~ Today, I remain the cutest ******* little girl in Syndicate!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: These jingling and jangling shits are kinda cute, but they ******* dangle too much!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Wha... what you looking at? Is there... something weird about me?!

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Chief, let's talk this over, can we, like, not go to Syndicate? That place... uh, it really scares me! Definitely not because I'm afraid of being seen by someone...

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Huh?! Are they even match for me?!

rooftop_reckoning.title: Level Up
rooftop_reckoning.text: Wait wait wait... Is this the power of bond like those high-school animes?

rooftop_reckoning.title: Obtain Attire
rooftop_reckoning.text: Alright, all done. Now peace is restored. Chief told me to keep it low-key on this mission, but you gotta step up when you see bullies, right?

rooftop_reckoning.title: Greeting
rooftop_reckoning.text: Now that I've taken care of those small fry, the view from up here is actually pretty nice. Care to sit with me for a bit? I bet the sun set view will be even better.

rooftop_reckoning.title: Ordinary Contact 1
rooftop_reckoning.text: Open your idiot eyes and look closer! I'm not the bully here—they are! What I do is just giving them what they had coming. Punish! Evil! Got it?!

rooftop_reckoning.title: Ordinary Contact 2
rooftop_reckoning.text: If I were to go to school, I'd never pick on my classmates! Only scums would stoop that low. We in the Iron Gang take the high road—we never mess with ordinary people.

rooftop_reckoning.title: Idle
rooftop_reckoning.text: Hmm? Why so quiet? You're not scared, are you...

rooftop_reckoning.title: Annoyed
rooftop_reckoning.text: Told ya, no weapon on me. I can use whatever's nearby to beat the sh*t out of these lowlifes.

rooftop_reckoning.title: Special Attention
rooftop_reckoning.text: Well? My moves to punish the bad guys are even more impressive than you thought, aren't they? Go ahead, take it all in—this isn't something you get to see every day.
